DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the concurrent validity (correlation coefficient of scores at 1 time point) between the Brain Performance Test (BPT, Lumos Labs, Inc.) and a validated third party computerized assessment.
DOC.brief_title: Reliability and Validity of Online Cognitive Assessments
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject will complete two sessions, each approximately 1 hour in total duration, approximately 2 weeks apart for a total duration of participation of 2 hours over 2 weeks
DOC.criteria: Electronically signed informed consent 18 years of age or older Native EnglishSpeaker Consistent access to a computer with stable internet connection Under 18 years of age Native language other than English Visual impairment that impedes computer use Has taken a cognitive assessment or done cognitive training in the past year
